38.heading: Mouse.
38.title: "Mouse Club"
38.author: Alfonso Azpiri
notes: Summary: Lorna and Matt try a robbery at Mouse's club. The plan is for Lorna to distract the guards while Matt gets the money. After six hours the guards are worn out and Matt still hasn't given the signal, because Matt has been likewise distracted by a girl robot. They get no money.
This story also appears in Heavy Metal, v. 14, no. 3 (July 1990), p. 88-91 and in 15 Years of Heavy Metal (1992) (Heavy Metal Special ; v. 6, no. 4)

39.heading: Mouse.
39.title: "The Return"
39.author: Alfonso Azpiri
notes: Summary: Mouse sends out bounty hunters to get Lorna and her robots. A being crashes and is almost killed near Lorna's station and is rescued by the robots. It is dying and demands sex, then it dies and gives birth to an even more agressive being, that has a bomb. The robots rush Lorna into her spaceship and escape as the station explodes. The bounty hunters are caught in the explosion and return to Mouse damaged and empty-handed.

142.heading: Mouths.
142.title: "Cookie Stuffer"
142.author: by Greg Evans.
notes: Summary: Some older brothers are firefighters, athletes or lifeguards, while Brad is putting 30 Oreos in his mouth at once.

143.heading: Mouths.
143.title: "Don't Annoy Him, Bernice, He'll Explode"
143.author: by Greg Evans.
notes: Summary: Brad's mouth is so full of Oreo cookies that he can't talk.

144.heading: Mouths.
144.title: "Don't Worry, Those Golf Caps Usually Pop Right Back Into Shape"
144.author: Mort Walker.
notes: Summary: Fuzz tries to give the general tips on putting, and ends up with his own hat stuffed into his mouth.

145.heading: Mouths.
145.title: "Dry Mouth is a Common Side Effect"
145.author: Glasbergen.
notes: Summary: The pharmacist explains the cactus on his tongue.

146.heading: Mouths.
146.title: "Explosions of Flavor in Your Mouth"
146.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Irwin says the chewing gum is designed for younger folks: Broom-Hilda's false teeth fly out.

147.heading: Mouths.
147.title: "Fair Warning, No Loud Crying"
147.author: Armstrong.
notes: Summary: Marvin aggravates a headache, and ends up with his diaper tied over his mouth.

148.heading: Mouths.
148.title: "Golf in the Lawn Chair"
148.author: by Bil Keane
148.appears_in: reproduced on p. 111 of Golf in the Comic Strips, ed. by Howard Ziehm (General Publishing Group, 1997).
notes: Summary: Dad's sleeping with his mouth open in the back yard, and the kids are preparing to use the cavity for golfing.

149.heading: Mouths.
149.title: "Grampa Sent Me This Dog Whistle, but Ruff Won't Even Put It In His Mouth!"
149.author: Ketcham.

150.heading: Mouths.
150.title: "I'm Playing Fish Hatchery"
150.author: Jim Davis.
notes: Summary: Garfield has 119 sardines in his mouth.

151.heading: Mouths.
151.title: "Is It Still Stickin' to the Roof of Your Mouth?"
151.author: [No author]
notes: Summary: Joey is standing on his head in the kitchen.

152.heading: Mouths.
152.title: "It's a Good Thing I Don't Have Fishing Worms"
152.author: Russell Myers.
notes: Summary: Perky and her friends are standing with their mouths wide open pretending to be baby birds, asking Beanz for food.

153.heading: Mouths.
153.title: "It's Like a Cave Down There"
153.author: by Mike Peters.
notes: Summary: The veterinarian doesn't see a mailman in Sumo.

154.heading: Mouths.
154.title: "Me and My Big Mouth"
154.author: Smythe.
notes: Summary: Flo says she's tired of staying in, and then ends up mowing the lawn.

155.heading: Mouths.
155.title: "My Lawyer's the Fastest Mouth in the West"
155.author: O'Neal.
notes: Summary: If the "fastest gun in the West" has shot so many men, why hasn't he ever been in jail?

156.heading: Mouths.
156.title: "No Crumbs!"
156.author: Greg.
notes: Summary: Brad stacks 30 Oreos, then tries to get out of putting them all in his mouth.

157.heading: Mouths.
157.title: "One Little Tug"
157.author: Thaves.
notes: Summary: If you use enough dental floss you can do your whole mouth at once.

158.heading: Mouths.
158.title: "One Thing I Can't Stand is a Smart-Alecky Newspaper Boy"
158.author: Dick Cavalli.
notes: Summary: Chips yawns and the newspaper lands in his mouth.

159.heading: Mouths.
159.title: "Putting Your Mouth to Good Use : Some Great Oral Tips"

160.heading: Mouths.
160.title: "Stacking Oreos at the Fair"

161.heading: Mouths.
161.title: "Stuck This Way"
161.author: by Greg Evans.
notes: Summary: Reaching his goal of 30 Oreos in his mouth at once, Brad can't swallow and won't spit. Luann and Bernice consider taking him on tour, to fairs, malls and Letterman. Call no.: PN6726f.B55 "Letterman"

167.heading: Mouthwash.
